projects.name: This Website!
projects.description: Embarked on a solo project to design and construct a personal portfolio website showcasing my diverse range of projects and accomplishments. Leveraged Next.js and TailwindCSS to ensure a seamless and visually appealing user experience. Implemented robust search engine optimization (SEO) strategies and integrated cybersecurity best practices throughout the development process to enhance the website's visibility and security.

projects.name: Password Analyzer
projects.description: At Hack RPI, participated in a team of three to address real-world challenges through innovative problem-solving. Utilized a technological stack comprising Node.js, TailwindCSS, and jQuery to develop a password analyzer aimed at enhancing public understanding of cybersecurity and promoting effective password security practices. Played a pivotal role in the creation of a search engine leveraging rainbow tables for in-depth password complexity analysis. Through this project, demonstrated strong collaboration, technical proficiency, and a commitment to advancing cybersecurity education and awareness.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Explored new technologies whilst developing an application to provide weather data in a fashionable manner with user location data as parameters.

title: Intro to IT & Web Science - Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: A web app customized to our own image listing labs completed in class and detailing our class work.

projects.name: Charity Finder
projects.description: A guide helping beginners to navigate their way into the world of charitable donations. Allows users to explore top rated charities ranked by Forbes. Users will find their match -- donating to the organization they truly care about.

title: Web Systems Development - Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute

projects.name: Team Website
projects.description: Web app that showcases each team member and their related skills. Each team member page is independently developed to act as their own resume. Additionally, the team website links to other projects completed as a team throughout the semester.

projects.name: Constitution App
projects.description: In tandem with the American federal observance - Constitution Day - this app provides the verbatim texts of Articles 1 - 7 and Amendments 1 - 10 as well as our analysis for each section respectively. The app additionally includes a section dedicated to the history of the American Constitution.

projects.name: Film Finder
projects.description: Ever wonder on what streaming service you'd like to watch your movie or show? Well, consider your problems solved with Film Finder. Not only does Film Finder direct you to the platform streaming your desired film, but it also personalizes your search by creating a digital portfolio of your favorites and precisely calculating a match score representative of how much we think you will like the film.

title: Web Science Systems Development - Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute

projects.name: News App
projects.description: This news app compiles over two thousand news articles to be displayed in a fashionable ticker.

projects.name: Budget Buddy
projects.description: A modern solution to most expense tracking problems. Budget buddy aims to assist small organizations and individuals in finance bookkeeping. No more excel, Budget Buddy provides an easy to understand UI with key features geared to enhancing the user experience. Budget Buddy encourages great financial habits such as goal setting and budget creation.
